tool_description: Add subliminals to your favorite music, or just background ambient sounds. Our subliminal messaging API allows users to enhance their MP3 files with personalized subliminal messages. By simply providing text input, users can embed affirmations and motivational statements into their audio content. This powerful tool can be used in various scenarios, including self-improvement, studying, and language learning.  Affirmations: Users can create custom affirmations that promote positive thinking, s...
name: Add Subliminal Messages to MP3s
title: Add Subliminal Messages to MP3s

api_list.name: CreateSubliminal
api_list.description:
**Takes Json body with three inputs
** 
- inputMp3URL (url of mp3 max 25mb file size)
- text (what do your subliminals say? Keep this as short as possible so it can loop properly and reinforce the subliminal message.
- volume (optional, integer between 0.1 and 1)
 
returns mp3 URL. You must save this on your own server as it is only stored by us for 24 hours.

Unless there's a problem with the volume, don't use the volume parameter.
Text is converted to speech and will be your subliminal.

{
  "inputMp3URL": "https://download.samplelib.com/mp3/sample-12s.mp3",
  "text": "This is some subliminal text.",
  "volume":0.1
}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://add-subliminal-messages-to-mp3s.p.rapidapi.com/subliminals/createsubliminal"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "add-subliminal-messages-to-mp3s.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://add-subliminal-messages-to-mp3s.p.rapidapi.com/subliminals/createsubliminal"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "add-subliminal-messages-to-mp3s.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
